import scarlet from '../images/scarlet.PNG' import green from '../images/green.PNG' import mustard from '../images/mustard.PNG' import white from '../images/white.PNG' import plum from '../images/plum.PNG' import peacock from '../images/peacock.PNG' import {useEffect} from 'react' import io from 'socket.io-client' const socket = io.connect('http://localhost:4000'); export default function Character(){ function selected(character){ if(document.getElementById(character).textContent === "Select"){ document.getElementById(character).textContent = "Selected"; socket.emit("send_message", {"message": character}); }else{ document.getElementById(character).textContent = "Select"; socket.emit("send_message", {"message": character}); } } useEffect(() => { socket.on("receive_message", (message) => { const element = document.getElementById(message); console.log(message); if (element) { if (element.textContent === "Select") { element.textContent = "Selected"; } else { element.textContent = "Select"; } } }); }, [socket]); // Dependency array includes socket return(

CLUEDO
